data.title: Even the Rain - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Even the Rain with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
69 Metascore

2010

1 hr 43 mins

Drama

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

In this thoughtful drama, a film director (Gael Garcia Bernal) and his producer (Luis Tosar) travel to Bolivia to make a movie, only to get caught up in a protest over the privatization of the country's water supply thanks to one of their actors. Directed by Icíar Bollaín.
